oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-04-25 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 25, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Porter Wagoner (host/performer), guest performer Skeeter Davis (although Elton Britt was advertised as the guest for this week on the previous show), and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Hank Garland, Archie Campbell, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1020th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Archie Campbell; Skeeter Davis; Grandpa Jones; Porter Wagoner
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Porter Wagoner introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Porter Wagoner, Skeeter Davis) -- Prince Albert commercial (Archie Campbell, Porter Wagoner) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Porter Wagoner introduces Skeeter Davis -- Set Him Free (Skeeter Davis) -- Porter Wagoner introduces Grandpa Jones -- Melinda (Grandpa Jones) -- Grant Turner and Porter Wagoner announce his tour schedule -- A Satisfied Mind (Porter Wagoner) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Porter Wagoner) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Garland, Hank, 1930-2004; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Campbell, Archie; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Wagoner, Porter; Davis, Skeeter
